name: Touch grey, Avoid blue and purple.
name_original: Touch grey, Avoid blue and purple.
description:
Goal: Turn the Map red!

Wasnt able to finish due to procrastination but I tackled alot of problems and learned alot of things about Unity and C# like Nav Mesh and some UI things. Looking forward to implementing what I learned into future games!

Future features:
-health bar
-enemy behaviors

-health drainage

-levels

-Menu
